snippet: President Obama will ask Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz to serve another term as chairwoman of the Democratic National Committee to preside over the party as it heads into the next election cycle.
abstract: President Obama will ask Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz to serve another term as chairwoman of the Democratic National Committee to preside over the party as it heads into the next election cycle.

headline.main: Obama to Ask Wasserman Schultz to Stay On as D.N.C. Chief
